title: Cruel Enchantment
description: Winged demonesses, otherworldly lovers, and a dragon with an enormous sexual appetite collide with spoiled princesses, spell-weavers, and wicked ancestors in these fantastic tales of lust and magic. Cruel Enchantment is a stunning collection of unique and breathtakingly beautiful erotic fairy tales. Seductive, dazzling, and strange, with each story a journey into the marvelous realms of a fertile imagination.
author: Janine Ashbless
